name: @n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.rerankerCohere
semantic_context: Use Cohere Reranker to reorder documents after retrieval from a vector store by relevance to the given query.

modelName.name: modelName
modelName.description: The model that should be used to rerank the documents. Learn more.
modelName.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

topN.name: topN
topN.description: The maximum number of documents to return after reranking
topN.ai_hint: The maximum number of documents to return after reranking
